state - of - the - art face detector.from sentence: In this paper , inspired by the RPN in Faster R - CNN and the multi-scale mechanism in SSD , we develop a state - of - the - art face detector with real - time speed on the CPU .

novel face detector.from sentence: Specifically , we propose a novel face detector named FaceBoxes , which only contains a single fully convolutional neural network and can be trained end - to - end .

new anchor densification strategy.from sentence: Besides , we propose a new anchor densification strategy to make different types of anchors have the same density on the input image , which significantly improves the recall rate of small faces .

lightweight yet powerful network structu.from sentence: The proposed method has a lightweight yet powerful network structure ( as shown in ) that consists of the Rapidly Digested Convolutional Layers ( RDCL ) and the Multiple Scale Convolutional Layers ( MSCL ) .

MSCL.from sentence: The RDCL is designed to enable FaceBoxes to achieve real - time speed on the CPU , and the MSCL aims at enriching the receptive fields and discretizing anchors over different layers to handle various scales of faces .
